short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show you latest hot/new reddits whenever you are. Very handy :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will show you latest hot/new reddits whenever you are. Very handy :)

It doesn't eat your memory,
doesn't distract you,
doesn't do any background tasks.

Just when you want to check out what's up on reddit - click on icon - and you will get latest reddits.
